x = int(input())

year = 0
balance = 100

while balance < x:
    year += 1
    balance += balance * 0.01

print(year)

import sys

def main():
    x = int(sys.stdin.readline())
    years = 0
    balance = 100
    while balance < x:
        balance += balance * 0.01
        years += 1
    print(years)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

x = int(input())

year = 0
balance = 100

while balance < x:
    balance += balance * 0.01
    year += 1

print(year)

x = int(input())

year = 0
balance = 100

while balance < x:
    balance = int(balance * 1.01)
    year += 1

print(year)
